200.description: Book object or null if not found

req.description: The ID of the book to retrieve

req.description: Search term for filtering books by title

req.name: keyword
req.description: Keyword to search in log messages

req.description: Start datetime in format YY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

req.name: end
req.description: End datetime in format YY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

req.name: count
req.description: Number of items per page (0 < count < 16)

req.description: 验证码标记码，用于验证码校验
